Package com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.utils

Class AnnotationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.utils.AnnotationUtils
public final class AnnotationUtils extends Object
An instance of this class provides generalized methods for processing annotations.
Author:
Mackenzie High

  • Constructor Details

      public AnnotationUtils(ModuleCompiler module)
      Sole Constructor.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • compileAnnotation

      public org.objectweb.asm.tree.AnnotationNode compileAnnotation(IAnnotation annotation)
      This method compiles a single annotation to its bytecode representation.

      Note: This method does not perform any type-checking.

      Parameters:
      annotation - is the annotation to compile.
      Returns:
      the bytecode representation of the given annotation.

    • compileAnnotationList

      public List<org.objectweb.asm.tree.AnnotationNode> compileAnnotationList(Iterable<IAnnotation> annotations)
      This method compiles a list of annotations to their bytecode representations.

      Note: This method does not perform any type-checking.

      Parameters:
      annotations - are the annotations to compile.
      Returns:
      an immutable list containing the compiled list of annotations.

    • typesOf

      public List<IAnnotation> typesOf(AnnotationList annotations)
      This method gets the type representations of the annotations in an annotation-list.

      This method performs type-checking on the annotation-list.

      Parameters:
      annotations - is the annotation-list itself.
      Returns:
      an immutable list containing the types of the annotations in the annotation-list.

    • typeOf

      public IAnnotation typeOf(Annotation annotation)
      This method creates the type-system representation of an annotation from its AST node.

      The method will issue an error-message, if the annotation-type does not exist.

      Parameters:
      annotation - is the AST node that represents the annotation.
      Returns:
      the annotation's type-system representation, or null, if no such representation can be created.

    • typeOf

      public IAnnotation typeOf(Class type)
      This method creates the type-system representation of an annotation a Class object.
      Parameters:
      type - is the class-object that represents the annotation-type.
      Returns:
      the annotation's type-system representation, or null, if no such representation can be created.

    • add

      public void add(ICustomAnnotatable annotated, Class type)
      This method adds a marker annotation to an annotatable custom entity.
      Parameters:
      annotated - is the annotatable custom entity.
      type - is the type of the annotation.
